data.title: tested alloy wheel kerb protector!
data.meta_description: Prevent wheel and tyre damage with AlloyGator alloy wheel protectors. Our fitters provide 5 star fitting services in partnership with us.
data.text:
Kerb-it, We Dare You!

We get it… wheel and tyre damage is infuriating and expensive, so eliminate this stress from your day and take pride in your ride knowing that AlloyGators are your alloy wheel protectors.

AlloyGator Wheel Kerb Protectors are a highly engineered, robust wheel protector designed to take the impact of kerbing and driving over potholes. Drive with confidence knowing that your Wheels and Tyres are safe from road damage!

Set of 4 AlloyGators

£64.95 – £94.95 Select options This product has multiple variants. The options may be chosen on the product page

Single Replacement AlloyGator

£24.95 Select options This product has multiple variants. The options may be chosen on the product page

5 Star Fitting Service

£95.00 Select options This product has multiple variants. The options may be chosen on the product page

AlloyGator Fitters in the UK

AlloyGator Trained Fitters

All of our recommended fitters have gone through an extensive AlloyGator training course run by our experienced team of technicians. Use the contact details provided to discuss your fitting with these recommended fitters.

AlloyGator trained 5 Star Fitters

5 Star Fitters are elite partners who provide Gold Standard fitting services in partnership with us. The 5 Star Fitting Service is available to purchase online – buy with your AlloyGator wheel kerb protectors at a discounted price! Your warranty is also extended to 2 years if you choose to use our 5 Star Fitting.

AlloyGator Mobile Fitters

Our Mobile Fitters will come to you! They have gone through an extensive AlloyGator training course run by our experienced team of technicians. Use the contact details provided to discuss your fitting with these recommended fitters.
